Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder-section of a light-brown pottery wine-jar, the fabric is grey in section, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and remains of two lines of black-painted hieratic text identifying the contents as wine from the head vintner Hany.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393526) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393526)
